title: WTT/WTB: Oversize for Oversize or just Oversize
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: WTT/WTB: Oversize for Oversize or just Oversize
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade one of my Engle oversized cards below for any oversized card you may have.

Or if you have an oversized card, would be interested in buying it.  Condition doesn't matter much assuming it's not torn in half or painted pink or something.

Let me know!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=227116&d=1460154433[/IMG]
Bump. Anyone got one to trade?  Or sell?

Jeff, 

as I'm sure you may know, Luke Lyon usually has a decent amount of these. Send him a PM.
Anyone have an oversize for trade or sale?  Have these Engles available but can also pay pp.  Not overly worried about condition.....creases are cool with me.
